full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(BTZAN MDOS BTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DUR BED NAS DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA NANG SO SKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS AU TSUGS MTHAR SKYEL GYIS BSKUL BA RIGS DANG MA BZLOG PAR, LHA 'DRE STONG GI DRA BA LAS 'BYUNG BA DANG SGO BSTUN TE KU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS NOR SKYONG DANG BRGAL TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI GU SHRI NGAG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA RIS MED YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
